NAME: requestVesselPosition
DESCRIPTION: Request the position of a vessel

NAME: MDR_LUCENE_REINDEX
DESCRIPTION: Allows the user to reindex Lucene Indexes

NAME: MDR_SEARCH_CODE_LIST_ITEMS
DESCRIPTION: Allows the user to use the Lucene based MDR search API

NAME: MANAGE_ADMIN_CONFIGURATIONS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view/update activity configurations located under the Admin tab

NAME: CODE_LISTS_ENABLE_DISABLE_SCHEDULED_UPDATE
DESCRIPTION: allows the user to enable/disable the code lists scheduled update

NAME: UPDATE_MDR_CODE_LISTS
DESCRIPTION: allows the user to update all or selected list of MDR code lists

NAME: LIST_MDR_CODE_LISTS
DESCRIPTION: allows the user to view all MDR code lists

NAME: CONFIGURE_MDR_SCHEDULER
DESCRIPTION: allows the user to view and modify the scheduler configuration

NAME: EXPORT_VMS_REPORT_DATA
DESCRIPTION: Allows user to export VMS data of a report

NAME: MANAGE_ALL_REPORTS
DESCRIPTION: allows user to delete/edit and share/unshare (private/scope/globally) reports

NAME: MANAGE_REFERENCE_DATA
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to manage reference data/system areas

NAME: CREATE_USER_AREA_DATASET
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to set create a USM dataset

NAME: SHARE_USER_DEFINED_AREAS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to share your user defined areas within the available to your profile scopes

NAME: VIEW_AREA_MANAGEMENT_UI
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to have access to the user interface of area management

NAME: ALLOW_USER_SPATIAL_REPORT_CONFIGURATIONS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to set custom spatial configurations at the report level

NAME: ALLOW_USER_SPATIAL_CONFIGURATIONS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to override default admin spatial configurations

NAME: MANAGE_ANY_USER_AREA
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to to list/update/delete any user area no matter who has created it

NAME: EXPORT_ACTIVITY_DATA
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to export activity data in several formats

NAME: SHOW_DELETED_FA_REPORTS
DESCRIPTION: Allows the user to make requests that show the deletes reports

NAME: MANAGE_ADMIN_CONFIGURATIONS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view/update activity configurations located under the Admin tab

NAME: VIEW_FA_REPORT_DETAILS
DESCRIPTION: allows user to see fishing activity reports details

NAME: FISHING_TRIP_SUMMARY
DESCRIPTION: allows user to see Fishing Trip Summary

NAME: LIST_ACTIVITY_REPORTS
DESCRIPTION: allows user to see Activity Reports

NAME: ACTIVITY_ALLOWED
DESCRIPTION: Enables Activity module to become USM aware

NAME: MANAGE_USER_DEFINED_AREAS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to create/view/update and delete user defined areas

NAME: MANAGE_SYSTEM_SPATIAL_CONFIGURATIONS
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view/update spatial configurations located under the Admin tab
